item.description: 我的博客 / 设计模式 / CI/CD CI/CD # Concepts # Pipeline # PipelineStage # Fields： Name Type Desc ID string PipelineID string PrevPipelineStageID string Status uint8 Pending, Runing, Success, Failed, Abort Name string PipelineStageTask # Fields： Name Type Desc ID string PipelineStageID string PrevPipelineStageTaskID string Image string Container image task running on.
